hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(test("\\.tsx?$"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'npx eslint --fix "$1" && npx prettier --write "$1"' sh
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(test("\\.py$"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'black "$1" && isort "$1" && flake8 "$1" || true' sh
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path | select(test("\\.go$"))' | xargs -r sh -c 'gofmt -w "$1" && go vet "$1" 2>&1 || true' sh
